Total snow accumulations of 6 to 11 inches. * WHERE...Cascade mountains of Whatcom and Skagit Counties, including the Mount Baker Ski Area and Cascade mountains of
entry.cap:areaDesc: West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes
